Name: constrain_sprint_capacity_by_velocity
Description: The sum of story points for all user stories in a sprint must not exceed the team's average velocity.

Name: constrain_worker_availability
Description: The total effort of tasks assigned to a worker in a sprint must not exceed their availability.

Name: enforce_minimum_team_size
Description: A development team must have a minimum number of workers to be functional.

Name: enforce_maximum_team_size
Description: A development team must not exceed the maximum number of workers to remain agile.

Name: require_mandatory_product_owner
Description: A team must be assigned exactly one Product Owner.

Name: require_mandatory_scrum_master
Description: A team must be assigned exactly one Scrum Master.

Name: prevent_assignment_of_inactive_workers
Description: A worker with an 'inactive' status cannot be assigned to any tasks.

Name: require_sprint_goal
Description: Every sprint must have one and only one defined sprint goal.

Name: task_must_belong_to_sprint_user_story
Description: A task can only be in the sprint backlog if its parent user story is also in the sprint backlog.

Name: budget_must_not_be_exceeded
Description: The total cost of the project must not exceed its allocated budget.

Name: epic_cannot_be_in_sprint_backlog
Description: An Epic, as a large body of work, cannot be directly included in a sprint backlog.

Name: certified_skill_for_critical_tasks
Description: For tasks of type 'critical', the assigned worker must have a certified skill.

Name: feature_must_have_documentation
Description: A feature cannot be part of a release plan unless it has associated feature documentation.
